an5.107:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an5.107:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silasampanno hoti, samadhisampanno hoti, pannasampanno hoti, vimuttisampanno hoti, vimuttinanadassanasampanno hoti.
an5.107:3.1: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
